title: The Ant
description: Ants are social insects that live in colonies and are known for their highly organized societies, strength relative to their size, and complex communication systems.

questions.question: How much weight can an ant typically carry relative to its own body weight?
What type of social structure do ant colonies have?
options: Caste system with queen, workers, and soldiers
questions.correct_answer: Caste system with queen, workers, and soldiers

questions.question: How do ants communicate with each other?
What is the primary role of the queen ant in the colony?
options: Laying eggs to produce more ants
questions.correct_answer: Laying eggs to produce more ants

questions.question: How long can some ant species live?
options: Queen ants can live up to 30 years
questions.correct_answer: Queen ants can live up to 30 years
